title: New LakersGround.net Logos
content:
I'm the head graphics guru on LakersGround.net which is the most popular community for fans of the Los Angles Lakers.   
   
I've designed some new logos which will be used on the website as well as on some CafeShops items.   
   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019234920im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/38731.gif)   
   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019234920im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/38732.gif)   
   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019234920im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/38733.gif)   
   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019234920im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/38734.gif)   
   
   
Check this out to see them on real world items... [http://www.cafeshops.com/uberzev](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019234920/http:/www.cafeshops.com/uberzev)
author: uberzev

comments.content: Lets see if my avatar shows up...

Your new logo design is better than the one currently on the website. The "LG" seems redundant on the versions with the text portion and at smaller sizes is hard to distinguish.   
   
The "S" doesn't seem right - sort of floating above the baseline or maybe reworking the lower curve.   
   
Also, your Cafe Press shop doesn't appear to have any items on it.
